www.eluaproject.net

Some poor videos (better ones comming soon) at:
http://www.giga.puc-rio.br/videosvfd/

To receive e-mail notifications about the svn repo activity, pls subscribe to http://groups.google.com/group/eluaexamples-svn
Vacuum Fluorescent Display controlling in eLua.

Doc is [http://code.google.com/p/eluaexamples/source/browse/trunk/vfd/README here]

Code is [http://code.google.com/p/eluaexamples/source/browse/trunk#trunk/vfd%3Fstate%3Dclosed here]
  * The main module with the control primitives is [http://code.google.com/p/eluaexamples/source/browse/trunk/vfd/vfd.lua vfd.lua]
  * A script that defines some art functions (pls see Doc above) is [http://code.google.com/p/eluavfd/source/browse/trunk/artvfd.lua artvfd.lua]
  * A script that defines some number and string showing functions is [http://code.google.com/p/eluavfd/source/browse/trunk/numvfd.lua numvfd.lua]
